DASH-Sim Manual
Domain-Focused Advanced Software-Reconfigurable Heterogenous SoC Simulator
DTPM_run_dagger.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 '''!
2 @brief This file runs the simulator multiple times and applies DAgger (used by the IL-based DTPM policy)
3 
4 Step-by-step execution:
5 - This file prepares the dataset by creating a copy of the initial dataset (if the file ends with " - Initial.csv"), otherwise the current dataset is directly modified.
6 - Generate the oracle and update the dataset.
7 - Execute the pre-defined number of DAgger iterations:
8  - Train the policy based on the current dataset
9  - Call the simulator to execute the given workload and aggregate data to the dataset
10 '''
11 
12 import os
13 from shutil import copyfile
14 import time
15 
16 import common
17 import DASH_Sim_v0
18 import DASH_Sim_utils
19 import DTPM_train_model
20 
21 def main():
22  start_time = time.time()
23 
24  dataset_oracle = common.DATASET_FILE_DTPM
25  dataset_oracle_initial = common.DATASET_FILE_DTPM.split('.')[0] + " - Initial.csv"
26  if os.path.exists(dataset_oracle_initial):
27  copyfile(dataset_oracle_initial, dataset_oracle)
28 
29  import DTPM_generate_oracle
30  DTPM_generate_oracle.generate_oracle()
31 
32  if os.path.exists(common.RESULTS):
33  os.remove(common.RESULTS)
34 
35  for iter in range(common.DAgger_iter):
36  DASH_Sim_utils.clean_policies()
37 
38  common.wrong_predictions_freq = 0
39  common.wrong_predictions_num_cores = 0
40  common.total_predictions = 0
41  common.missed_deadlines = 0
42 
43  DTPM_train_model.main("")
44 
45  if iter == 0:
46  common.first_DAgger_iteration = True
47  else:
48  common.first_DAgger_iteration = False
49 
50  DASH_Sim_v0.run_simulator()
51 
52  sim_time = float(float(time.time() - start_time)) / 60.0
53  print("--- {:.2f} minutes ---".format(sim_time))
54 
55 if __name__ == '__main__':
56  main()
57
